name: Bouncy Berry 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Play as a tiny, adorable, bouncy strawberry looking to escape from a traditional bakery. Using kitchen utensils and cake toppings, climb giant, delicious cakes and pastries as you bounce your way towards freedom: the window.

Platform: PC, Nintendo Switch
Engine: Unity
Number of players : 1

Producer : Raphaël DALLERY
Game Art : Natacha BRABANTS, Eléonor THIBOUT, Héléna BEILLOIN
Game Design : Julien DI NATALE, Leo COMPE, Charlie WAGNER
Game Design & Programming : Loïc JACOB, Tom FALEMPIN
Game Programming : Pierre-Marie MITTAUD, Pierre PÉTILLAT
Music & Sound Design : Valentin D'AUBUISSON
